name: Wandering 10,001
description:
This "RPG" game is on Sale for now! It is Early Access & in development! The sale will last as long as it takes to get enough play testers, and game reviewers! After that point the game will be full price until Cyber Mondays, which only happens once a year!

<><><><><><><><><><><><>THE GAME<><><><><><><><><><><><>

You are a confused & lost Princess, you own some land, a castle, & a boat! It's a Puzzle Adventure game & is on Hardcore mode!

Over time you will build your castle up as you have very little furniture in your castle off the get go!

You will be on several adventures, It's a straight forward game meaning any quests you may have will be intuitive, If you ever get lost in game just click the land, water, or mountains, & you will find or unlock stuff!

There is one spot a boulder is Moveable as well so pay attention to that!

There is no point in game you will be able to save your game as it is hardcore! :)

Have fun and please don't die lots lols :P Sincerely Sarainia!

[Note] If you have suggestions, please send them my way and I will try to do the hotfix as soon as I read the suggestion, & also if I feel the need if those changes are relevant!

[Note] If you do leave a review please note while this game is still a work in progress that your review may or may not be accurate for the Final version of the game!
